'''Where the Shadows Lie''' is the second track on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)]]. It plays during the credits of ''[[Alloyed]]''. Its lyrics are derived from the "[[Ring-inscription#Ring-verse|verse long known in Elven-lore]]" from ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
Three Rings for the [[Elves|Elven]]-kings under the sky,
Seven for the [[Dwarves|Dwarf]]-lords in their halls of stone,
Nine for Mortal [[Men]] doomed to die,
One for [[Sauron|the Dark Lord]] on his dark throne
In the Land of [[Mordor]] where the Shadows lie.
Where the Shadows lie.

[[The One Ring|One Ring]] to rule them all, One Ring to find them,
One Ring to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them
In the Land of Mordor where the Shadows lie.
Where the Shadows lie.
Where the Shadows lie.
Where the Shadows lie.

One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them,
One Ring to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them.''
</poem>
